ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The Obama administration reaffirmed Sunday that it will begin pulling U.S. troops out of Afghanistan next summer, despite reservations among top generals that absolute deadlines are a mistake.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The Obama administration has decided to file suit to block a new Arizona law aimed at deporting illegal immigrants, thrusting itself into the fierce national debate over how the United States enforces immigration policies.
